subtitle:

title: CAPSA
subtitle:
4 rallies have been called by 'Justice for Refugees' for Saturday September 14th. 

Melbourne: State Library of Victoria at 11am
Sydney: Town Hall Square at 2pm
Perth: Forrest Place at 11am
Brisbane: King George Square: 12pm

title: SCARF Refugees
subtitle:
